title: Rationale Schema
description: Schema for a Rationale object used in the Strategic Response Model to explain the reasoning behind strategic responses

rationaleTitle.description: Title or summary of the rationale

description.description: A detailed explanation of the rationale supporting a strategic response

triggerReference.description: Reference to the trigger that prompted this rationale

linkedDomains.description: List of business architecture domains influenced or justified by this rationale

rationaleType.description: The justification type for this response rationale

reasoningPattern.description: The logical structure of the rationale

strategicObjectiveReference.description: Reference to the strategic objective this rationale supports

businessValueType.description: The nature of value creation or preservation

dateCreated.description: The date the rationale was first recorded

author.description: The person or team who documented the rationale

orgUnitTitle.description: The organizational unit that owns or authored the rationale
